enchantment.vtweaks.lumbering.desc:
§3當潛行時：§r
    破壞其中一個木頭方塊即可砍倒整棵樹。
    §4§l對樹以外也有效§r
enchantment.vtweaks.imperishable.desc:
Saves your tool or armor piece from breaking,
    thus §ldisabling the item's functionality
    until repaired.§r
vtweaks.intro.message: Welcome! Seems like this is your first time running V-Tweaks in this world! Here's a link to an online wiki if you're interested, keep in mind some features may be disabled!
vtweaks.tool.damaged: §4§l你的工具損壞太嚴重，無法使用！
